metadata.dc:description: A case of giant hemangiolymphangioma of abdominal cavity is reported. It showed severe bleeding from consumption coagulopathy and secondary fibrinolysis. (Kasabach-Merritt syndrome). A review is made of the production mechanism of coagulation abnormalities that may accompany vascular neoplasias, the usefulness of anticoagulants and the selective treatment in this type of disease.
metadata.dc:title: Hemangiolinfangioma de cavidad abdominal complicado con coagulopatía por consumo
[Hemangiolymphangioma of the abdominal cavity complicated with consumption coagulopathy].
